DOC.brief_summary: Epidural analgesia still impact obstetric outcome especially instrumented delivery rate . To assess best maintainance regimen epidural analgesia labor investigator plan include 300 nulliparous multicenter randomize , double blind trial . The primary outcome composite set criterion lead instrumented delivery . Secondary outcome focus analgesia motor block satisfaction .
DOC.brief_title: PIEB-PCEA Versus CEI-PCEA Labor Analgesia Nulliparous
DOC.detailed_description: Patients inform anaesthetic consultation recruit begin labor comply inclusion criterion . Habitual proceeding place induction epidural analgesia ( Local Anaesthetics ( AL ) : Levobupivacaine 0.100 % 15mL Sufentanil 10µg ) . Patients obtain 30min pain score < 1/10 exclude ( epidural analgesia functional ) . The upkeep analgesia provide automatic pump randomize : classic pump new pump . The mixture use 2 group : Levobupivacaine 0.0100 % + Sufentanil 0.5µg/mL . The classic pump administers AL continuous output ( 8mL/h ) even though new pump administers AL bolus ( 8mL every hour ; begin 1h induction ) . The classic pump pump CADD SMITHS PCEA ( Patient Controlled Epidural Analgesia ) programming : continuous output 8mL/h ; Additional bolus necessary : 8mL ; Maximal dose hour : 24mL . The new pump pump CADD SMITHS call PIEB ( Programmed Intermittent Epidural Bolus ) programming : intermittent bolus 8mL every hour ; Additional bolus necessary : 8mL ; Ban period 10min patient bolus automatic bolus ; Maximal dose hour : 24mL . In case pain reappears calm 2 successive patient bolus , anaesthetist call evaluation administration doctor bolus necessary ( Levobupivacaine 0.125 % 5mL associate 50µg Clonidine ) . Collected data demographic data , data obstetrical labor proceeding , data pain , motor block , maternal satisfaction , total quantity administer analgesia , number patient doctor bolus wich ask administered neonatal data . Endpoints collect doctor blind type pump ( 2 pump extern aspect , intern program different ) . In case caesarean labor , patient exclude study . When decision extraction take , patient receive bolus AL accord anaesthetist decision account dose calculation .
DOC.criteria: Nulliparous patient spontaneous labor full term , normal pregnancy , carrier singleton cephalic position , distension < 4cm eligible epidural analgesia Patient sign informed consent Patient affiliate beneficiary social medical insurance Patient age 18 44 year old Morphinic administration care Anomaly fetal cardiac rate Fetal maternal anomaly wich n't allow evaluate motor block Known uterine malformation Contraindications thrust pregnancy Patient protect law Patient guardianship
